rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Merida Keys enters the battlefield, return up to one target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{6}, {T}: Create a 4/1 black and green Zombie Treefolk creature token. It can’t block this turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each card type among cards in your graveyard.
